text: (For those who do good) for those who profess Allah's divine Oneness (is the best (reward)) i.e. Paradise (and more (thereto)) i.e. beholding Allah's Countenance; it is also said that 'more' means: greater reward. (Neither dust) darkness and gloominess (nor ignominy) grief (comes near their faces) are seen on their faces. (Such are rightful owners of the Garden) the folk of Paradise; (they will abide therein).
